creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the artist with the assistance of Keiko Gallery
description: abstract leaf like form with mother-of-pearl inlay at top and near bottom; opposite side resembles bat wing; attaches to small rectangular wooden base
markings: on back of a, near bottom, red pigment, small seal; near lower corner of b, in red pigment, small seal; label on back of a, near bottom with Japanese and English
medium: Lacquer, hemp cloth, mother-of-pearl, and wood
signed: back of a, near bottom, in red pigment: [\'09]
title: Wing of Foliage #37
